class.name: CubinderShape4D
class.description: CubinderShape4D is a shape created by extruding a 3D cylinder into 4D space. It is defined by a radius of a circle in the XZ plane, a height in the Y direction, and a thickness in the W direction. The cubinder is centered at the origin. If you want a cubinder in a different orientation, you can rotate the [CollisionShape4D] node the cubinder is attached to.

members.member: The height of the cubinder in meters in the Y direction. This is the value that is stored internally.
The radius of the cubinder in meters in the XZ directions. This is the value that is stored internally.
The size of the cubinder in meters in the W and Y directions. This is a wrapper around [member height] and [member radius].
The thickness of the cubinder in meters in the W direction. This is the value that is stored internally.
